
= Set/Change Printer =

These are the instructions for setting or changing a company printer in iCaRas. 

    1) Login to iCaRas admin
    2) Navigate to 'Printer Queue Setup'
    3) Enter the company code in printer queue (hit query to see all options)
    5) Enter desired printer name in 'Printer/Command' field
    6) Hit Update to save changes
